meanings.definition: A photograph made by a process on glass that appears as a positive when viewed against a black background.
meanings.sent1: The ambrotypes displayed in the museum were clear and detailed.
meanings.sent2: I bought an ambrotype of my family to hang on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The ambrotypes at the antique shop seemed to come to life when you looked at them.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like ambrotypes, preserved in the glass of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The ambrotypes captured moments frozen in time, like windows to the past.
